slides.question: Koje parametre koristimo u buildXY ako želimo da izgradimo ogradu?
options: fence, x coordinate and y coordinate - this.buildXY('fence', 34, 44)
just x and y coordinates - this.buildXY(34, 44)
just x and y coordinates - this.buildXY(34, 44)

slides.text: Igrajte Code Combat i naučite nove trikove
